review: Easy set up - does exactly what I expected from Amazon!

review: Amazing product was thrilled with all the apps and movies just with one click of the remote !! Amazon is always providing amazing quality products and will forever be a customer to amazon !
author: Holly T.

review: I am enjoying all the different choices of movies and programs.  I love the preview on the movies!  very easy to use!

review: still learning how to use it but I wish I'd known about it sooner.
author: M. Baker

review: Well I have a Kindle and Amazon Prime so I thought the Fire TV stick would be a good ideal, that was a mistake. The fire stick keeps pausing while watching a movie, new apps you can set up but can't keep them, it's not user friendly. Bottom line is that I have a Roku also and I like It a 100% better and more user friendly.
author: donald jones

review: The up button stopped working for us right out the box.  It functions great aside from that, but I wish the button worked.Solution:If this happened to you and you can't go up, either:A) be very precise of what you want to watch / doorB) Press the back button, and traverse all the way through again!
author: DDoan
